anya-e0805n5:3_0: Atha ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.
anya-e0805n5:4_2: Tattha kāloti atītādayo, kārakamiti kammakattubhāvā, purisāti paṭhamamajjhimuttamā, kriyāti gamanapacanādiko dhātvattho, kriyālakkhaṇaṁ saññāṇaṁ etassāti kriyālakkhaṇaṁ, atiliṅgañca.
anya-e0805n5:8_0: Kālādivasena dhātvatthaṁ vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, tyādayo, tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n5:9_0: Kriyaṁ dhārentīti dhātavo, bhūvādayo, khādidhātuppaccayantā ca, te pana atthavasā dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā, akammakā cāti.
anya-e0805n5:9_1: Tatra sakammakā ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā –
anya-e0805n5:9_2: kaṭaṁ karoti, gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacatītiādayo, akammakā ye kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā –
anya-e0805n5:10_0: Te pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṁ?
anya-e0805n5:10_2: Niggahītapubbakaavikaraṇā rudhādayo, yavikaraṇā divādayo, ṇuṇā uṇāvikaraṇā svādayo, nāppaṇhāvikaraṇā kiyādayo, oyiravikaraṇā tanādayo, sakatthe ṇe ṇayantā curādayoti.
anya-e0805n5:11_0: Tattha paṭhamaṁ avikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā bhūiccetasmā dhātuto tyādayo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n5:12_0: Bhūsattāyaṁ, “bhū”iccayaṁ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
anya-e0805n5:15_0: Bhūiccevamādayo ye kriyāvācino saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
anya-e0805n5:15_1: Bhū ādi yesaṁ te bhūvādayo, atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṁ te bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n5:20_0: Anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:21_0: Kvaciggahaṇaṁ “mahīyati samatho”tiādīsu nivattanatthaṁ, iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
anya-e0805n5:23_0: 426.Vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe.
anya-e0805n5:24_0: Tyādayo dvādasa vattamānāsaññā hontīti tyādīnaṁ vattamānatthavisayattā vattamānāsaññā.
anya-e0805n5:29_0: Paccuppanne kāle gamyamāne vattamānāvibhatti hoti, kāloti cettha kriyā, karaṇaṁ kāro, rakārassa lakāro, kālo.
anya-e0805n5:33_0: Idha pana kālassa atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālābhipattivasena chadhā bhinnattā “paccuppanne”ti viseseti.
anya-e0805n5:33_1: Taṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ paṭicca uppanno paccuppanno, paṭiladdhasabhāvo, na tāva atītoti attho.
anya-e0805n5:36_0: Tasmiṁ paccuppanne vattamānāvibhattiṁ katvā, tassā ṭhānāniyame “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti paribhāsato dhātuto paraṁ vattamānappaccaye katvā, tesamaniyamappasaṅgesati “vatticchānupubbikā saddappaṭipattī”ti parassapadavacanicchāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:38_0: Atha taddhitānantaraṁ vuccamānānaṁ sabbāsaṁ vattamānādīnaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni parassapadasaññāni hontītiādimhi channaṁ parassapadasaññā, parassatthāni padāni parassapadāni, tabbāhullato tabbohāro.
anya-e0805n5:41_0: Kattarikārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi parassapadaṁ hotīti parassapadaṁ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge vatticchāvasā –
anya-e0805n5:44_0: Tāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ parassapadāna’mattanopadānañca dve dve vacanāni yathākkamaṁ paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0805n5:44_2: Ti antiiti paṭhamapurisā, si thaiti majjhimapurisā, mi maiti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0805n5:44_3: Attanopadesupi te anteiti paṭhamapurisā, se vheiti majjhimapurisā, e mheiti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0805n5:44_5: Evaṁ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe ākhyātapade dvattiṁsa dvattiṁsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā hontīti vattamānaparassapadādimhi dvinnaṁ paṭhamapurisasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:46_0: Tumhāmhasaddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṁ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite “ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ti.
anya-e0805n5:47_0: “Paro, paccayo, dhātū”ti ca adhikāro, “yathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n5:49_0: Bhūiccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro apaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n5:52_0: Kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṁyogantānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0805n5:52_2: Ettha ca “ghaṭādīnaṁ vā”ti ito vāsaddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:55_0: Yuvaṇṇānampi ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na;
anya-e0805n5:60_0: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n5:60_1: “Saralopo mādesa”iccādinā saralopādimhi kate “naye paraṁ yutte”ti paranayanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:61_0: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṁ cittaṁ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:65_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṁ anti, pure viya appaccayavuddhiavādesā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:65_1: Te purisā bhavanti, appayujjamānepi bhavati, bhavanti.
anya-e0805n5:68_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi majjhimapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacanaṁsi, sesaṁ purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:68_1: Tvaṁ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha, appayujjamānepi bhavasi, bhavatha.
anya-e0805n5:72_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi uttamapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṁ mi, appaccayavuddhiavādesā.
anya-e0805n5:74_0: Akāro dīghamāpajjate himimaiccetāsu vibhattīsu. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. Bhavāmi, bhavāma.
anya-e0805n5:77_0: Sabbāsaṁ vattamānānaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni hontīti teādīnaṁ attanopadasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:80_0: Kattari ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0805n5:80_1: Caggahaṇaṁ katthaci nivattanatthaṁ, sesaṁ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:80_2: Bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:81_0: Paca pāke, dhātusaññāyaṁ dhātvantalopo, vuttanayeneva tyādyuppatti, ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānamabhāvā vuddhiabhāvovettha viseso.
anya-e0805n5:81_1: So devadatto odanaṁ pacati, pacanti, pacasi, pacatha, pacāmi, pacāma, so odanaṁ pacate, te pacante, tvaṁ pacase, tumhe pacavhe, ahaṁ pace, mayaṁ pacāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:84_0: Sabbesaṁ paṭhamamajjhimānaṁ, paṭhamuttamānaṁ, majjhimuttamānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānaṁ ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0805n5:84_2: So ca pacati, tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge tumhe pacathāti bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:84_3: Evaṁ so ca pacati, ahañca pacāmīti mayaṁ pacāma, tathā tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṁ pacāma, so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṁ pacāma.
anya-e0805n5:85_1: “So ca pacati, tvañca pacissasi, ahaṁ paciṁ” ettha bhinnakālattā “mayaṁ pacimhā”ti na bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:86_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṁ dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0805n5:89_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussanto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, sabbaggahaṇena mānanta ya kāritappaccayesu ca.
anya-e0805n5:90_0: Vidhiṁ niccañca vāsaddo, māna’ntesu tu kattari;
anya-e0805n5:92_0: Appaccayaparanayanāni, so puriso gāmaṁ gacchati, te gacchanti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa re vā hoti, gacchare.
anya-e0805n5:94_0: Attanopadepi so gāmaṁ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:95_0: “Kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī”tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:98_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:101_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti, casaddena kammakattaripi.
anya-e0805n5:101_1: Bhavanaṁ bhāvo, so ca kārakantarena asaṁsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho.
anya-e0805n5:101_3: Akammakāpi dhātavo sopasaggā sakammakāpi bhavanti, tasmā kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto vattamānattanopadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ te.
anya-e0805n5:104_1: Attanopadavisayevāyamissate, “aññesu cā”ti sutte anuvattitavāggahaṇena yappaccaye vuddhi na bhavati, anubhūyate sukhaṁ devadattena.
anya-e0805n5:110_1: Yakārassa dvittaṁ, anubhūyyati mayā sukhaṁ, anubhūyyate vā, anubhūyyanti.
anya-e0805n5:112_0: Bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva, tañca paṭhamapurisasseva, bhūyate devadattena, devadattena sampati bhavananti attho.
anya-e0805n5:113_0: Pacadhātuto kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:116_0: Tassa bhāvakammavisayassa yappaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṁ hoti dhātvantena saha yathāsambhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:116_1: Ettha ca “ivaṇṇāgamo vā”ti ito sīhagatiyā vāsaddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:117_0: Cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṁ, dhātvantānaṁ yavattanaṁ;
anya-e0805n5:119_0: Dhātvantassa cavaggādittā cakāre kate “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti cakārassa dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:119_1: Paccate odano devadattena, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci re hoti.
anya-e0805n5:120_3: Tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante.
anya-e0805n5:121_0: Gamito kammani attanopade, yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:124_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṁ bhāvakammavisaye yappaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo.
anya-e0805n5:128_0: Heṭṭhānuttehi parassevedaṁ, tena kaṭapavaggayakāralasanteheva dhātūhi paro yappaccayo pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti makārā parassa yakārassa makāro.
anya-e0805n5:131_0: 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṁ antaṁ, ssuvho, e āmase.
anya-e0805n5:134_0: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe anuttakāle pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:135_0: Satipi kālādhikāre puna kālaggahaṇena vidhinimantanājjhesanānumatipatthanāpattakālādīsu ca pañcamī.
anya-e0805n5:135_1: Āṇāpanamāṇatti, āsīsanamāsiṭṭho, so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa atthassa patthanaṁ, tasmiṁ āṇatyāsiṭṭhe.
anya-e0805n5:135_2: Anu samīpe uttakālo anuttakālo, paccuppannakāloti attho, na uttakāloti vā anuttakālo, tasmiṁ anuttakāle, kālamanāmasitvā hotīti attho.
anya-e0805n5:136_0: Tattha āsīsanatthe bhūdhātuto pañcamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ tu, appaccayavuddhiavādesā.
anya-e0805n5:136_1: So sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0805n5:139_1: Tvaṁ sukhī bhava, bhavāhi vā, himhi dīgho.
anya-e0805n5:139_3: Ahaṁ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṁ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0805n5:140_0: Attanopade so sukhī bhavataṁ, te sukhitā bhavantaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:140_1: Tvaṁ sukhī bhavassu, tumhe sukhitā bhavavho.
anya-e0805n5:140_2: Ahaṁ sukhī bhave, mayaṁ sukhitā bhavāmase.
anya-e0805n5:142_0: Āṇattiyaṁ kattari devadatto dāni odanaṁ pacatu, pacantu.
anya-e0805n5:143_0: Kammani yappaccayacavaggādi, paccataṁ odano devadattena, paccantaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:145_0: Kammani gacchīyataṁ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṁ, gamīyatu, gammataṁ, gammatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:146_0: Vidhimhi idha pabbato hotu, ayaṁ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
anya-e0805n5:147_0: Nimantane adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṁ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:149_0: Anumatiyaṁ pucchatu bhavaṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ, ettha nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n5:150_0: Patthanā yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0805n5:151_0: Pattakāle sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:153_0: 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁeyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:157_0: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:158_1: Kattumicchato parassa anujānanaṁ anumati, parikappanaṁ parikappo, “yadi nāma bhaveyyā”ti sallakkhaṇaṁ nirūpanaṁ, hetukriyāya sambhave phalakriyāya sambhavaparikappo ca.
anya-e0805n5:159_0: Tattha parikappe sattamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ eyya, appaccayavuddhādi purimasamaṁ, “kvaci dhātu vibhattī”tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṁiccetesaṁ vikappena ekārādeso.
anya-e0805n5:159_1: So dāni kiṁ nu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya, sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṁ, na nirujjheyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:159_3: Kathamahaṁ devo bhaveyyāmi, kiṁ nu kho mayaṁ bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0805n5:160_0: Patthane tu ahaṁ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:162_0: Vidhimhi so odanaṁ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:164_0: Anumatiyaṁ so gāmaṁ gacche, gaccheyya, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā eyyussa uṁ vā, gacchuṁ, gaccheyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:165_0: Kammani gacchīyetha, gamīyetha, gacchīyeraṁ, gamīyeraṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:165_1: Parassapadatte gacchīyeyya, gamīyeyya, gammeyya, gammeyyuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:168_0: 455.Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṁmhā, tthatthuṁ, sevhaṁ, iṁmhase.
anya-e0805n5:172_0: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā hiyyattanīvibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ā.
anya-e0805n5:175_0: Kvaci dhātūnamādimhi akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n5:179_1: Abhavo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā okārassa aādeso vā, abhava, abhavattha.
anya-e0805n5:180_0: Kammani yappaccayo, tayā sukhamanvabhūyattha, akārāgamābhāve anubhūyattha, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā tthassa thādeso, anvabhūyatha, anubhūyatha, anvabhūyatthuṁ, anubhūyatthuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:181_0: Tathā so odanaṁ apacā, pacā, apacū, pacū.
anya-e0805n5:184_0: Kammani agacchīyattha, gacchīyattha, agamīyattha, gamīyattha, agacchīyatthuṁ, gacchīyatthuṁ, agamīyatthuṁ, gamīyatthuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:187_0: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātukasaññā hontīti hiyyattanādīnaṁ sabbadhātukasaññattā “ikārāgamo asabbadhātukamhī”ti vutto ikārāgamo na bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:189_0: 459.Parokkhā a u, e ttha, aṁ mha, ttha re, tho vho, iṁmhe.
anya-e0805n5:190_1: Akkhānaṁ indriyānaṁ paraṁ parokkhā, taddīpakattā ayaṁ vibhatti parokkhāti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:192_0: Apaccakkhe vattuno indriyāvisayabhūte atīte kāle parokkhāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:192_1: Atikkamma itoti atīto, hutvā atikkantoti attho.
anya-e0805n5:197_0: Kha cha sesu parokkhāyaṁ, dvebhāvo sabbadhātunaṁ;
anya-e0805n5:201_0: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo avayavo, so abbhāsasañño hotīti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:204_0: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti vā, akāro ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:211_0: Abbhāsagatānaṁ dutiyacatutthānaṁ vaggabyañjanānaṁ yathākkamaṁ paṭhamatatiyā hontīti bhakārassa bakāro.
anya-e0805n5:213_0: Brūbhūiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti parokkhāvibhattiyanti bhūsaddassa bhūvaādeso, “saralopo mādesappaccayādimhī”tiādinā saralopādi, so kira rājā babhūva, te kira babhūvu.
anya-e0805n5:216_0: Sabbasmiṁ asabbadhātukamhi pare kvaci dhātūhi paro ikārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:219_0: Ettha ca “na sabbadhātukaṁ asabbadhātuka”miti katvā “hiyyattanī sattamī pañcamī vattamānā sabbadhātuka”nti hiyyattanīādīnaṁ sabbadhātukasaññāya vuttattā tadaññā catasso vibhattiyo asabbadhātukanti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:220_1: Ahaṁ kira babhūvaṁ, mayaṁ kira babhūvimha.
anya-e0805n5:221_0: Kammani attanopade īkārāgamayappaccayikārāgamā, anubabhūvīyittha, yappaccayassa asabbadhātukamhi “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā lope kate ivaṇṇāgamo na bhavati, tayā kira anubabhūvittha, anubabhūvire iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:223_0: Kammani papaccittha, papaccire iccādi. Tathā apacca, apaccū iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:227_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa cavaggo hotīti vakārassa jakāro, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā anabbhāsassa paṭhamapurisekavacanamhi dīgho.
anya-e0805n5:227_1: So gāmaṁ jagāma kira, jagama vā, jagamu.
anya-e0805n5:230_0: 468.Ajjatanī ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ, amhe.
anya-e0805n5:231_1: Ajja bhavo ajjatano, taddīpakattā ayaṁ vibhatti ajjatanīti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:234_0: Samīpe samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanīvibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ī.
anya-e0805n5:235_0: Pure viya akārāgamo, vuddhādi ca, “kvaci dhātuvibhattī”tiādinā īmhādivibhattīnaṁ kvaci rassattaṁ, oāavacanānaṁ itthaamādesā ca, saralopādi, so abhavi, abhavī vā, akārāgamābhāve bhavi.
anya-e0805n5:238_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi uṁvibhattissa iṁsvādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_0: Te abhaviṁsu, bhaviṁsu vā, abhavuṁ, bhavuṁ vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_1: Tvaṁ abhavi, bhavi vā, abhavo, bhavo vā, tumhe abhavittha, bhavittha vā, ikārāgamo.
anya-e0805n5:239_2: Ahaṁ abhaviṁ, bhaviṁ vā, mayaṁ abhavimha, bhavimha vā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_3: So abhavittha, bhavittha vā, abhavā, bhavā vā, abhavū, bhavū vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_4: Abhavise, bhavise vā, abhavivhaṁ, bhavivhaṁ vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_5: Abhavaṁ, bhavaṁ vā, abhava, bhava vā, abhavimhe, bhavimhe vā.
anya-e0805n5:240_0: Kammani yappaccayalope vuddhiavādesādi, sukhaṁ tayā anubhavittha, anvabhūyittha, anubhūyittha vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:240_1: Parassapadatte tayā anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, anvabhūyī, anubhūyī vā, anvabhūyiṁsu, anubhūyiṁsu, anvabhūyuṁ, anubhūyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:240_2: Tvaṁ anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, tumhe anvabhūyittha, anubhūyittha.
anya-e0805n5:240_3: Ahaṁ anvabhūyiṁ, anubhūyiṁ, mayaṁ anvabhūyimha, anubhūyimha, anvabhūyimhā, anubhūyimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:241_0: So apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā, te apaciṁsu, paciṁsu, apacuṁ, pacuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:241_1: Tvaṁ apaci, paci, apaco, paco vā, tumhe apacittha, pacittha.
anya-e0805n5:241_2: Ahaṁ apaciṁ, paciṁ, mayaṁ apacimha, pacimha, apacimhā, pacimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:241_3: So apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū.
anya-e0805n5:241_5: Apacaṁ, pacaṁ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.
anya-e0805n5:242_1: Parassapadatte apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī vā, apacciṁsu, pacciṁsu, apaccuṁ, paccuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:242_2: Apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā, apaccittha, paccittha.
anya-e0805n5:242_3: Apacciṁ, pacciṁ, apaccimha, paccimha, apaccimhā, paccimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:243_0: So gāmaṁ agacchī, gacchī, agacchi, gacchi vā, te agacchiṁsu, gacchiṁsu, agacchuṁ, gacchuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:243_1: Tvaṁ agacchi, gacchi, agaccho, gaccho vā, tumhe agacchittha, gacchittha.
anya-e0805n5:243_2: Ahaṁ agacchiṁ, gacchiṁ, mayaṁ agacchimha, gacchimha, agacchimhā, gacchimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:244_0: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ajjatanimhi gamissa cchassa kvaci ñchādeso, agañchi, gañchi, agañchī, gañchī vā, te agañchiṁsu, gañchiṁsu, agañchuṁ, gañchuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:244_1: Tvaṁ agañchi, gañchi, agañcho, gañcho vā, tumhe agañchittha, gañchittha.
anya-e0805n5:244_2: Ahaṁ agañchiṁ, gañchiṁ, mayaṁ agañchimha, gañchimha, agañchimhā, gañchimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:245_0: Cchādesābhāve so agami, gami, agamī, gamī vā, “karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī”ti ettha bhāvaniddesena, “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena vā sāgame “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā byañjanato ākārāgamo, agamāsi, uṁvacanassa kvaci aṁsvādeso, ucāgamo tthamhesu kvaci, agamiṁsu, gamiṁsu, agamaṁsu, gamaṁsu, agamuṁ, gamuṁ, tvaṁ agami, gami, agamo, gamo vā, agamittha, gamittha, agamuttha, gamuttha.
anya-e0805n5:245_1: Ahaṁ agamiṁ, gamiṁ, agamimha, gamimha, agamumha, gamumha, agamimhā, gamimhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:246_0: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā gamissa ajjatanimhi gādeso ca, so ajjhagā, paralopo, te ajjhaguṁ.
anya-e0805n5:247_0: Attanopade so agacchittha, gacchittha, agañchittha, gañchittha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:247_1: Cchādesābhāve so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, ajjhagū, agū.
anya-e0805n5:247_3: Ahaṁ agamaṁ, gamaṁ, agama, gama, ajjhagaṁ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.
anya-e0805n5:248_0: Kamme gāmo agacchīyittha tena, gacchīyittha, agañchiyittha, gañchiyittha, agamīyittha, gamīyittha, agamittha, gamittha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:248_1: Parassapadatte agacchīyi, gacchīyi vā, agamīyi, gamīyi vā, agacchīyuṁ, agamīyuṁ vā.
anya-e0805n5:251_0: Yadāmāyogo, tadā hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo sabbakālepi honti, casaddena pañcamī ca.
anya-e0805n5:251_1: Mā bhavati, mā bhavā, mā bhavissatīti vā atthe hiyyattanajjatanīpañcamī vibhattiyo, sesaṁ neyyaṁ, so mā bhavā, mā bhavī, mā te bhavantvantarāyā.
anya-e0805n5:251_2: Mā pacā, mā pacī, mā pacatu.
anya-e0805n5:251_3: Mā gacchā, mā gacchī, mā gacchatu.
anya-e0805n5:251_4: Mā kañci pāpamāgamā, mā agami, mā gamā, mā gamī, mā gametu.
anya-e0805n5:251_5: Tvaṁ mā gaccho, mā gacchi, mā gacchāhi iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:253_0: 472.Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁssāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:254_1: Bhavissatīti bhavissanto, taṁkāladīpakattā ayaṁ vibhatti bhavissantīti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:259_0: Na āgato anāgato, paccayasāmaggiyaṁ sati āyatiṁ uppajjanārahoti attho, ikārāgamo, vuddhiavādesā, saralopādi ca.
anya-e0805n5:261_0: Kamme yappaccayalopo, sukhaṁ tayā anubhavissate, anubhavissante.
anya-e0805n5:261_4: Bhāve bhavissate tena, yappaccayalopābhāve anubhūyissate, anubhūyissante iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:263_0: Kamme paccissate odano devadattena, paccissante iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:267_0: 484.Kālātipatti ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁssāmhase.
anya-e0805n5:268_1: Kālassa atipatanaṁ kālātipatti, sā pana viruddhapaccayūpanipātato, kāraṇavekallato vā kriyāya anabhinibbatti, taddīpakattā ayaṁ vibhatti kālātipattīti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:270_1: Kriyāya atipatanaṁ kriyātipannaṁ, taṁ pana sādhakasattivirahena kriyāya accantānuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:270_2: Ettha ca kiñcāpi na kriyā atītasaddena voharitabbā, tathāpi takkiriyuppattippaṭibandhakarakriyāya kālabhedena atītavohāro labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:271_0: Kālātipattiparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ssā, akārikārāgamā, vuddhiavādesā ca, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ssā ssāmhāvibhattīnaṁ kvaci rassattaṁ, ssevacanassa ca attaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:272_0: So ce paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa, bhavissa, abhavissā, bhavissāvā, te ce taṁ alabhissaṁsu, arahanto abhavissaṁsu, bhavissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:272_1: Evaṁ tvaṁ abhavissa, bhavissa, abhavisse vā, tumhe abhavissatha, bhavissatha.
anya-e0805n5:272_2: Ahaṁ abhavissaṁ, bhavissaṁ, mayaṁ abhavissamha, bhavissamha, abhavissāmhā, bhavissāmhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:274_0: Tathā so ce taṁ dhanaṁ alabhissa, odanaṁ apacissa, pacissa, apacissā, pacissā vā, apacissaṁsu, pacissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:274_1: Apacissa, pacissa, apacisse, pacisse vā, apacissatha, pacissatha.
anya-e0805n5:274_2: Apacissaṁ, pacissaṁ, apacissamha, pacissamha, apacissāmhā, pacissāmhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:275_2: Parassapadatte apaccissa tena, paccissa, apaccissā, paccissā vā, apaccissaṁsu, paccissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:276_0: So agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchissā, gacchissāvā, agacchissaṁsu, gacchissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:276_1: Tvaṁ agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchisse, gacchisse vā, agacchissatha, gacchissatha.
anya-e0805n5:276_2: Agacchissaṁ, gacchissaṁ, agacchissamha, gacchissamha, agacchissāmhā, gacchissāmhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:276_3: Agamissa, gamissa, agamissā, gamissā vā, agamissaṁsu, gamissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:276_4: Agamissa, gamissa, agamisse vā, agamissatha, gamissatha.
anya-e0805n5:276_5: Agamissaṁ, gamissaṁ, agamissamha, gamissamha, agamissāmhā, gamissāmhā vā.
anya-e0805n5:283_0: Isu icchākantīsu, pure viya dhātvantalopo, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n5:286_0: Isuyamuiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto ccho hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:286_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, “anto ccho vā”ti yogavibhāgena āsassapi.
anya-e0805n5:286_5: Cchādesābhāve asaṁyogantattā “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi, esati, esanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:287_0: Kamme attanopadassa yebhuyyena parassapadattameva payojīyati, tena cettha attanopade rūpāni saṅkhipissāma.
anya-e0805n5:287_1: So icchīyati, esīyati, issate, issati, yakārassa pubbarūpattaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:287_4: Parokkhāhiyyattanīsu pana rūpāni sabbattha payogamanugamma payojetabbāni, icchi, esi.
anya-e0805n5:289_0: Kamme niyacchīyati, niyamīyati, niyammati, saññamīyati vā.
anya-e0805n5:292_0: Kamme yakārassa pubbarūpatte kate “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā purimabhakārassa bakāro, labbhate, labbhante.
anya-e0805n5:295_0: Labhaiccetasmā dhātuto paresaṁ īiṁnaṁ vibhattīnaṁ ttha tthaṁiccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:295_2: Alabho, labho, alabhi, labhi, alabhittha, labhittha.
anya-e0805n5:295_3: Alatthaṁ, alabhiṁ, labhiṁ, alabhimha, labhimha iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:296_0: Bhavissantimhi “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti ettha sappaccayaggahaṇena vaca muca bhujādito ssassakhādeso, vasa chida labhādito chādeso ca vā hotīti ssassa chādeso, “byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā”ti dhātvantassa cakāro, lacchati, lacchanti.
anya-e0805n5:297_0: Vaca viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi, vacatha. Vacāmi, vacāma.
anya-e0805n5:300_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakārassa ukāro hoti yappaccaye pare, ādisaddena vaḍḍhassa ca.
anya-e0805n5:300_1: “Vassa a va”iti samāsena dutiyañcettha vaggahaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ, tena akārassapi ukāro hoti, purimapakkhe paralopo.
anya-e0805n5:302_0: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n5:303_0: Bhavissantimhi sappaccayaggahaṇena ssassa khādeso, “byañjanantassā”ti vattamāne “ko khe cā”ti dhātvantassa kādeso, vakkhati, vakkhanti.
anya-e0805n5:305_0: Kamme uttaṁ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. Vasatu. Vaseyya. Avasi, vasi.
anya-e0805n5:306_0: Bhavissantiyaṁ ssassa chādeso, dhātvantassa cakāro ca, vacchati, vacchanti.
anya-e0805n5:307_0: Tathā ruda assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. Rodissati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:308_0: Kusa akkose, āpubbo dvittarassattāni, appaccayavuddhiyo ca. Akkosati. Akkosatu. Akkoseyya.
anya-e0805n5:311_0: Kusa iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa cchiādeso hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:316_0: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yappaccaye pare, yappaccayassa ca lakāro hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:316_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, tena “gayhatī”tiādīsu lattaṁ na hoti, nimittabhūtassa yakārassevetaṁ lattaṁ, “vacavasa”iccādinā uttaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:319_0: Jaramara iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ jīrajīyyamīyyādesā honti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:321_0: Mara pāṇacāge, mīyyādeso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. Mīyati, mīyanti vā. Marati, maranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:324_0: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:324_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, tena dissādeso kammani sabbadhātuke eva.
anya-e0805n5:326_0: Hiyyattaniyaṁ “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhātuikārassa attaṁ, addasā, addasa. Kammani adissa.
anya-e0805n5:328_1: “Bhavissantimhi ssassa cā”ti yogavibhāgena ssassa lopo, ikārāgamo ca, dakkhiti, dakkhinti.
anya-e0805n5:332_0: Sadaiccetassa dhātussa sīdādeso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci.
anya-e0805n5:332_3: Bhāve nisajjate, idha kvacādhikārena sīdā-deso na bhavati. Nisīdatu. Nisīde. Nisīdi.
anya-e0805n5:336_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa yakārassa ikārādeso hoti yappaccaye pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n5:337_0: Vada viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n5:340_0: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n5:343_0: Bhūvādito paro appaccayo ettamāpajjate, lopañca vā.
anya-e0805n5:346_0: Appaccayassa ekāro, saralopādi, vajjeti, vadeti, vadati, antimhi –
anya-e0805n5:348_0: Idha dhātvādhikāre ākhyāte, kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṁ, tyādivibhattīnaṁ, dhātuvihitappaccayānañca dīghatabbiparītaādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpato bhavanti. Tattha –
anya-e0805n5:350_0: Āyūnaṁ vā vibhattīnaṁ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā.
anya-e0805n5:351_0: Gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā;
anya-e0805n5:352_0: Ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṁ yamhi dīghatā.
anya-e0805n5:354_0: Okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe.
anya-e0805n5:355_0: Tathā brūtoti antīnaṁ, au vāha ca dhātuyā;
anya-e0805n5:359_0: Ekārato parassa antiakārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti.
anya-e0805n5:359_1: Vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi, vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha.
anya-e0805n5:359_2: Vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.
anya-e0805n5:360_4: Vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya, vajjeyyuṁ, vadeyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:361_0: Kamu padavikkhepe, appaccaye kate “kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṁ dvebhāvo”ti dvittaṁ, kavaggassa cavaggo.
anya-e0805n5:367_0: Jhecintāyaṁ, appaccaye “o, sare, e”ti ca adhikicca “te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ekārassa āyādeso, jhāyati, jhāyanti iccādi, visesavidhānaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:369_0: Tuda byathane, tyādyuppatti appaccayo, “aññesu cā”ti etthānuvattita vāggahaṇena tudādīnaṁ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti.
anya-e0805n5:370_0: Kamme “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadakārassa yappaccayassa jakāro dvittaṁ, tujjate, tujjante.
anya-e0805n5:371_0: Visa pavesane papubbo, so gāmaṁ pavisati, pavisanti. Pavisasi, pavisatha. Pavisāmi, pavisāma.
anya-e0805n5:372_5: Pāvisi, pavisi, pāvekkhi pathaviṁ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ajjatanimhi visassa vekkhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n5:379_0: Hū, bhū sattāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti “bhūvādito a”iti appaccayo, “vā”ti adhikicca “lopañcettamakāro”ti bhūvādito parassa appaccayassa lopo, “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:379_1: So hoti, te honti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā parasarassa lopo.
anya-e0805n5:380_0: Tathā hotu, hontu. Hohi, anakāraparattā hilopo na bhavati, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyataṁ.
anya-e0805n5:381_0: Sattamiyaṁ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṁ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Heyyaṁ vā. Bhāve hūyetha.
anya-e0805n5:383_0: Ajjatanimhi “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hūto īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṁ, so ahu, lopābhāve “karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī”ti ettha “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena sāgamo, vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṁ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā okārassekāro.
anya-e0805n5:383_3: Ahosiṁ, ahuṁ, parasarassa lopo, rassattañca, ahosimha, ahumha, rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:384_0: “Hi lopaṁ vā”ti ito “lopo, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:386_0: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro eha oha ettamāpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:389_0: Hū, bhū sattāyaṁ, bhū itīdha anupubbo, tyādyuppatti appaccayassa lopavuddhiyo, anubhoti, anubhonti.
anya-e0805n5:391_0: Sī saye appaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. Sesi, setha. Semi, sema. Sete, sente iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:395_0: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:396_0: Kammeatipubbo, “kvaci dhātvā”dinā yamhi rassasarassa dhātvantassa dīgho, atisīyate, atisīyante.
anya-e0805n5:398_0: Saye, sayeyya, sayeyyuṁ. Atisīyeyya. Bhāve sīyetha.
anya-e0805n5:402_0: Nī pāpuṇane, dvikammakoyaṁ, ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti, nenti.
anya-e0805n5:402_4: Kamme nīyate gāmaṁ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante.
anya-e0805n5:406_4: Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṭhāto hakārāgamo ca rassattaṁ, saṁpubbo saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti.
anya-e0805n5:408_0: 493.Yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī.
anya-e0805n5:409_0: Bhāvakammavisaye yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto īkāramāpajjate, niccatthoyamārambho.
anya-e0805n5:409_2: Hakārāgame rassattaṁ, īkārāgamo ca, patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:413_0: Pāiccetassa dhātussa pibādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n5:415_0: Asa bhuvi, vibhattuppatti, appaccayalopo, asa itīdha –
anya-e0805n5:418_0: Asaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa tissa vibhattissa tthittaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthi.
anya-e0805n5:421_0: Sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca asaiccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Santi.
anya-e0805n5:424_0: Asadhātussa antalopo hoti simhi vibhattimhi ca. Tvaṁ asi.
anya-e0805n5:426_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa thassa vibhattissa tthattaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Tumhe attha.
anya-e0805n5:429_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṁ mi maiccetāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ mhimhaiccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:431_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthu.
anya-e0805n5:432_0: Sattamiyaṁ asassādilopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asato eyyaeyyuṁ vibhattīnaṁ iyāiyuñca honti.
anya-e0805n5:433_0: Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātvā”dinā asato eyyādīnaṁ sadhātvantānaṁ ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṁ ssāmaādesā honti.
anya-e0805n5:434_0: Evamassa vacanīyo, assu. Assa, assatha. Assaṁ, assāma.
anya-e0805n5:435_0: Ajjataniyaṁ akārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṁsu, āsuṁ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṁ, āsimha.
anya-e0805n5:438_0: Asasseva dhātussa bhūādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavissa, abhavissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:440_0: Brū viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayalopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:443_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi kvaci, vuddhiavādesā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:443_1: Bravīti, brūti, “aññesu cā”ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena brūdhātussa byañjane vuddhi na hoti, bahuvacane “jhalānamiyuvā sare vā”ti ūkārassa sare uvādeso, bruvanti.
anya-e0805n5:443_2: “Kvaci dhātvā”dinā brūto tiantīnaṁ vā a u ādesā brūssa āhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n5:445_0: Parokkhāyaṁ “brūbhūnamāhabhūvā parokkhāya”nti brūdhātussa āhaādeso, saralopādi, supine kira māha, tenāhu porāṇā, āhaṁsu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:446_0: Ajjataniyaṁ abravi, abruvi, abravuṁ. Bravissati. Abravissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:447_0: Hana hiṁsāgatīsu, timhi kvaci appaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti.
anya-e0805n5:448_0: Kamme “tassa cavagga”iccādinā ñattaṁ, dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare.
anya-e0805n5:451_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa vadhādeso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Vadheti.
anya-e0805n5:453_0: Hu dānādanahabyappadānesu, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca, “kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṁ dvebhāvo”ti dvittaṁ, “pubbobbhāso”ti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:456_0: Hakārassa abbhāse vattamānassa jo hoti. “Lopañcetta makāro”ti appaccayalopo, vuddhi. Juhoti.
anya-e0805n5:459_0: Jhalasaññānaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāravakārādesā honti sare pareti apadantassa ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n5:461_0: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. Hūyati, hūyanti.
anya-e0805n5:463_0: Hā cāge, pure viya dvebhāvajādesa appaccayalopā.
anya-e0805n5:467_0: Jahāti, jahanti. Jahāsi, jahātha. Jahāmi, jahāma.
anya-e0805n5:470_0: Dā dāne, tyādyuppatti, dvebhāvarassattāni, appaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti.
anya-e0805n5:473_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, appaccayalopo.
anya-e0805n5:473_4: Dajjādesābhāve “lopañcettamakāro”ti appaccayassa ekāro, dānaṁ deti, denti.
anya-e0805n5:476_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṁ hoti vā mimaiccetesu paresu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:480_2: Dajjaṁ, eyyāmissa amādeso ca, dajjeyyāmi, dajjeyyāma.
anya-e0805n5:484_0: Kālātipattiyaṁ adadissa, adajjissa, adajjissā, adassa, adassā, adassaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:485_0: Dhā dhāraṇe, pure viya vibhattuppatti, dvittarassattāni, appaccayalopo ca, “dutiyacatutthānaṁ paṭhamatatiyā”ti dhakārassa dakāro, dadhāti, dadhanti.
anya-e0805n5:485_1: Apipubbo tassa “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā akāralopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhakārassa hakāro, rassattañca, dvāraṁ pidahati, pidahanti.
anya-e0805n5:487_1: Dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe, pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya.
anya-e0805n5:489_0: Avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo;
anya-e0805n5:493_0: Rudha āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:496_1: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato appaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu, niggahītañca tato pubbaṁ hutvā āgamo hoti, tañca niggahītaṁ pakatiyā sarānugatattā dhātussarato paraṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n5:496_3: Idha saṁyogantattā na vuddhi hoti, tadāgamassa taggahaṇena gahaṇato.
anya-e0805n5:497_3: Rundhate, rundhante iccādi, ikārādippaccayesu pana rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhotītipi hoti.
anya-e0805n5:498_0: Kamme nipubbo yappaccayassa “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate “vagge ghosā”tiādinā dvittaṁ, maggo nirujjhate tena, nirujjhante.
anya-e0805n5:502_2: Yujjati, yujjanti. Yuñjatu. Yujjataṁ. Yuñje. Yujjetha.
anya-e0805n5:504_0: Bhavissantiyaṁ “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti sutte sappaccayaggahaṇena bhujato ssassa khādeso, “ko khe cā”ti dhātvantassa kakāro, vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhokkhanti.
anya-e0805n5:510_0: Divādito dhātugaṇato yappaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:511_0: “Yaggahaṇaṁ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṁ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:513_0: Yathā bhāvakammesu yappaccayassādeso hoti, tathā kattaripi yappaccayassa sadhātvantassa cavagga yakāravakārādeso, pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa vakārattā saha tena yakārassa vakāre kate dvibhāvo, “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇena “bo vassā”ti vuttattā vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṁ, dibbati, dibbanti.
anya-e0805n5:514_1: Dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbatu. Dibbataṁ. Dibbe. Dibbetha. Adibbi.
anya-e0805n5:515_0: Sivu tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. Sibbatu. Sibbeyya.
anya-e0805n5:516_0: Pada gatimhi, upubbo dvittaṁ, “tathā kattari cā”ti sadhātvantassa yakārassa jakāro, dvittañca.
anya-e0805n5:518_0: Kamme paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. Paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. Bhāve uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0805n5:520_0: Budha avagamane, yappaccayaparattā na vuddhi, jhakārādesova viseso, dhammaṁ bujjhati, bujjhanti.
anya-e0805n5:525_0: Naha bandhane, “ha vipariyayo”ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. Sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:526_0: Mana ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:527_0: Dā ādāne, saṁāpubbo “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā yamhi dhātvantassa ikāro, sīlaṁ samādiyati, samādiyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:528_0: Tusa pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṁ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:531_0: Janajanane, “janādīnamā timhi cā”ti ettha “janādīnamā”ti yogavibhāgena yamhi dhātvantassa ākāro.
anya-e0805n5:537_0: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇāuṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:538_4: Suṇāsi, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā rassattaṁ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha.
anya-e0805n5:539_0: Kamme yappaccaye “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante.
anya-e0805n5:542_4: Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sassa dvibhāvo, sāgamo, assosi, assosiṁsu, paccassosuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:544_0: Hi gatimhi, papubbo ṇāpaccayo, pahiṇāti, pahiṇati vā, pahiṇanti.
anya-e0805n5:546_0: Mi pakkhepe, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇassa nattaṁ, minoti, minanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:547_0: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo saralope “dīgha”nti dīgho, uṇāpaccayo, sampattiṁ pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0805n5:549_1: Bhāve “pubbarūpañcā”ti pubbarūpattaṁ, sakkate tayā, sakkati vā, sakkuṇātu.
anya-e0805n5:549_3: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā sakantassa khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi, asakkhiṁsu, sakkhiṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:552_0: Kī dabbavinimaye, vipubbo dvittaṁ, pure viya vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:554_0: Kīicceva mādito dhātugaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari.
anya-e0805n5:554_1: Nāparattā na vuddhi, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā kiyādīnaṁ nāmhi rassattaṁ, kīto nāpaccayanakārassa ṇattañca.
anya-e0805n5:557_0: Tathā ci caye, cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:561_0: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṁ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:562_0: Jādeso nāmhi jaṁ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha;
anya-e0805n5:565_1: Ivaṇṇāgame pubbalopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ekāro, dvittañca, ñeyyati, ñeyyanti.
anya-e0805n5:567_0: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāiccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Vijāniyā.
anya-e0805n5:571_0: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:577_9: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ssassa hi ca, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti. Ajānissa.
anya-e0805n5:578_0: Mā māne, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā māntassa ikāro, mināti, minanti. Kamme mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:579_0: Lū chedane, nāmhi rassattaṁ, lunāti, lunanti. Lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:580_0: Dhū kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. Dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:583_0: Gahaiccevamādito dhātuto ppa ṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari. Ādisaddoyaṁ pakāro.
anya-e0805n5:586_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:586_1: Sīlaṁ gaṇhāti, rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti.
anya-e0805n5:587_0: Kamme “ye”ti vattamāne “havipariyayo lo vā”ti hakārassa yakārena vipariyayo hoti. Gayhati, gayhanti.
anya-e0805n5:589_0: Yadā “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asabbadhātuke vikaraṇapaccayassa lopo, ikārāgamassa ekāro ca, tadā sāgamo.
anya-e0805n5:593_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gheādeso hoti ppappaccaye pare. Gheppati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:598_0: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato oyiraiccete paccayā honti kattari. Karatovāyaṁ yirappaccayo.
anya-e0805n5:599_0: Dhammaṁ tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma.
anya-e0805n5:603_0: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā tanudhātvantassa yamhi ākāro, patāyate, patāyante.
anya-e0805n5:608_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo, “yavakārā cā”ti apadantassa paraukārassa vakāro, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhāturakārassa vakārasmiṁ lopo, vakārassa dvitte tassa “bbo vvassā”ti bakāradvayaṁ, kubbanti, karonti.
anya-e0805n5:609_0: Kammeyappaccaye “ivaṇṇāgamo vā”ti īkārāgamo, yakārassa dvittaṁ, karīyyate kaṭo tena, karīyyati, karīyyanti.
anya-e0805n5:609_4: Ikārāgame “kvaci dhātu”iccādisutte caggahaṇena rayānaṁ vipariyayo, kayirati kaṭo tena, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:610_0: Tathā kusalaṁ karotu, kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu.
anya-e0805n5:611_0: Kamme karīyatu, karīyantu, kayyataṁ, kayirataṁ, kayiratu.
anya-e0805n5:616_3: Attanopade kayirātha dhīro, kubbetha, karetha vā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā kussa kru ca, krubbetha, krubberaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:617_0: Hiyyattaniyaṁ “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kā hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:621_0: Kara iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva kāsattaṁ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare.
anya-e0805n5:621_2: Atha vā yadā karassa kā hoti, sattañcāgamo ajjatanimhi vāti attho, tadā “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamopi sijjhati, “yogavibhāgato iṭṭhappasiddhī”ti yebhuyyena dīghatova hoti, “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kābhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṁ siddho hoti.
anya-e0805n5:622_4: Kāsattābhāve akari, kari, akariṁsu, kariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaruṁ.
anya-e0805n5:623_0: “Vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:625_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sappaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:625_1: Adhikabhūtasappaccayaggahaṇena vacamucabhujādito ssassa khādeso, vasa chidi labhādito chādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0805n5:627_0: Yadā saṁpubbo, tadā “purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā”ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi saṁpubbakarotissa kharādeso.
anya-e0805n5:629_0: Saka sattimhi, opaccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. Sakkosi, sakkotha. Sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:633_0: Dhura theyye, pure viya dhātvantalopo, vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:634_0: “Tathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti ca sīhavilokanena bhāvakammaggahaṇāni ca vattante, maṇḍūkagatiyā kāritaggahaṇañca.
anya-e0805n5:636_0: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, bhāve ca kammani, vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:640_0: Asaṁyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:642_0: Kamme yappaccaye īkārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:643_0: Coretu, corentu. Corehi. Corayatu, corayantu. Coraya, corayāhi.
anya-e0805n5:644_3: Acorayi, corayi, acorayiṁsu, corayiṁsu, acorayuṁ, corayuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:646_0: Tathā cinta cintāyaṁ, saṁyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.
anya-e0805n5:648_0: Manta guttabhāsane, manteti, mantayati iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:649_0: Pāla rakkhaṇe, dhammaṁ pāleti, pālayati. Pālīyati. Pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:650_0: Ghaṭa ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:652_0: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, “ghaṭādīnaṁ vā”ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:654_0: Bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā;
anya-e0805n5:655_0: Kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā.
anya-e0805n5:659_0: Tattha dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhā khādikāritantā paccayā dhātuppaccayā nāma.
anya-e0805n5:661_0: “Dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti ito dhātuggahaṇaṁ anuvattate, “parā, paccayā”ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n5:662_0: 528.Tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0805n5:663_0: Tija gupa kita māna iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:664_0: Tijato khantiyaṁ khova, nindāyaṁ gupato tu cho;
anya-e0805n5:669_0: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa kakārādeso hoti khappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:673_0: Dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi khādikāritantehi paccayehi tyādayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0805n5:675_0: Khappaccayābhāve appaccayassa ekāro, tejeti, tejati vā, tejanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:676_0: Gupa gopane, chappaccaye dvibhāvo, “pubbobbhāso”ti abbhāsasaññā, “abbhāsassā”ti vattamāne “antassivaṇṇākāro vā”ti abbhāsantassikāro, “kavaggassa cavaggo”ti abbhāsagakārassa jakāro ca.
anya-e0805n5:678_0: Dhātvanthassa byañjanassa cakārādeso hoti chappaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n5:682_0: Abbhāsagatānaṁ māna kitaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakāratakārattaṁ hoti vā yathākkamanti takāro, dhātvantassa cakāro, sesaṁ samaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:682_2: Takārābhāve “kavaggassa cavaggo”ti cakāro, vicikicchati, vicikicchanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:685_0: Tato abbhāsato parāsaṁ pāmānānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vāmaṁiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ sappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:690_0: Bhuja ghasa hara su pā iccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu ca kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:690_1: Tumicchānaṁ, tumantayuttaicchāya vā atthā tumicchatthā, tena tumantarahitesu “bhojanamicchatī”tiādīsu na honti, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti vākyassa appayogo, dhātvādissa dvebhāve kate “dutiyacatutthānaṁ paṭhamatatiyā”ti abbhāsabhakārassa bakāro, dhātvantassa “ko khe cā”ti kakāro, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:691_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Bhottumicchati, icchatthesūti kimatthaṁ? Bhottuṁ gacchati.
anya-e0805n5:692_0: Ghasa adane, ghasitumicchatīti atthe chappaccayo, dvittaṁ, tatiya cavagga ikāra cakārādesā, jighacchati, jighacchanti.
anya-e0805n5:695_0: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gī hoti se paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:695_1: “Gīse”ti yogavibhāgena jissapi, ṭhānūpacārenādesassāpi dhātuvohārattā dvittaṁ, bhikkhaṁ jigīsati, jigīsanti.
anya-e0805n5:696_0: Su savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n5:697_0: Pā pāne, pātumicchatīti atthe sappaccayadvittarassattaikārādesā, “tato pāmānānaṁ vāmaṁ sesū”ti vādeso, pivāsati, pivāsanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:699_0: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n5:701_0: Ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato āyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe.
anya-e0805n5:701_1: Upamīyati etenāti upamānaṁ, kattuno upamānaṁ kattupamānaṁ, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti ivasaddanivatti, dhātuppaccayantattā “tesaṁ vibhattiyo lopā cā”ti sutte tesaṁgahaṇena vibhattilopo, “pakati cassa sarantassā”ti pakatibhāvo, saralopādi, “dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo”ti vibhattuppatti, pabbatāyati saṅgho, evaṁ samuddamiva attānamācarati samuddāyati, cicciṭamiva attānamācarati cicciṭāyati saddo.
anya-e0805n5:704_1: Puna upamānaggahaṇaṁ kattuggahaṇanivattanatthaṁ, tena kammatopi sijjhati, sesaṁ samaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:704_2: Achattaṁ chattamivācarati chattīyati, aputtaṁ puttamivācarati puttīyati sissamācariyo.
anya-e0805n5:705_0: Upamānāti kiṁ? Dhammamācarati, ācāreti kiṁ? Achattaṁ chattamiva rakkhati.
anya-e0805n5:708_1: Attano pattamicchati pattīyati, evaṁ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, paṭīyati, dhanīyati, puttīyati.
anya-e0805n5:713_0: Dhātuyā rūpe nipphādetabbe, “taṁ karoti, tena atikkamati”iccādike payujjitabbe vā sati nāmamhā ṇayappaccayo hoti, kāritasaññā ca.
anya-e0805n5:713_1: Ṇalope, vibhattilopasaralopādīsu katesu vibhattuppatti, daḷhayati vīriyaṁ, evaṁ pamāṇayati, amissayati, tathā hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusalayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:714_0: 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0805n5:715_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti, te kāritasaññā ca honti.
anya-e0805n5:715_1: Hetuyeva attho hetvattho, so ca “yo kāreti sa hetū”ti laddhahetusañño suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā, atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
anya-e0805n5:717_0: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṁ;
anya-e0805n5:719_0: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
anya-e0805n5:722_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
anya-e0805n5:725_0: Tattha yo koci bhavati, tamañño “bhavāhi bhavāhi” iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā bhavantaṁ bhavituṁ samatthaṁ payojayati, bhavituṁ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā, kāritasaññā ca, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti vākyassa appayogo, “kāritānaṁ ṇo lopa”nti ṇalopo, “asaṁyogantassa vuddhi kārite”ti ūkārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:728_0: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare.
anya-e0805n5:728_1: “Te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena jheādīnaṁ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso, saralopādi, “dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo”ti tyādayo.
anya-e0805n5:729_0: So samādhiṁ bhāveti, bhāvayati, bhāventi, bhāvayanti.
anya-e0805n5:730_0: Kamme attanopadayappaccayaīkārāgamā, saralopādi ca, tena bhāvīyate samādhi, bhāvīyante.
anya-e0805n5:736_0: Abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, abhāvesuṁ, bhāvesuṁ, abhāvayiṁsu, bhāvayiṁsu, abhāvayuṁ, bhāvayuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:736_2: Abhāvesiṁ, bhāvesiṁ, abhāvayiṁ, bhāvayiṁ, abhāvimha, abhāvayimha.
anya-e0805n5:740_0: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṁsu, abhāvayissaṁsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:741_0: Tathā yo koci pacati, tamañño “pacāhi pacāhi” iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṁ payojeti, pacituṁ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo, akārassākāro vuddhi, sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:742_6: Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpeti, pācāpenti.
anya-e0805n5:743_0: Kamme so odanaṁ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
anya-e0805n5:744_1: Pācīyataṁ, pācīyatu, pācayīyataṁ, pācayīyatu, pācāpīyataṁ, pācāpīyatu, pācāpayīyataṁ, pācāpayīyatu.
anya-e0805n5:745_0: Gacchantaṁ, gantuṁ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṁ sampattāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:748_0: Ghaṭādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n5:749_0: So taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gameti, gamayati, gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:749_1: So gāmaṁ gamīyati tena, gamayīyati, gacchāpīyati, gacchāpayīyati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:750_0: Ghaṭa īhāyaṁ, ghaṭantaṁ payojayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭādīnaṁ vāti na vuddhi, ghaṭayati, ghaṭāpeti, ghaṭāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:753_0: Guhadusaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:754_0: Guha saṁvaraṇe, guhituṁ payojayati gūhayati, gūhayanti.
anya-e0805n5:754_1: Dusa appītimhi, dussantaṁ payojayati dūsayati, dūsayanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:755_0: Tathā icchantaṁ payojayati icchāpeti, icchāpayati, eseti, esayati.
anya-e0805n5:755_2: Āsantaṁ payojayati āseti, āsayati, acchāpeti, acchāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:755_4: Vacantaṁ payojayati vāceti, vācayati, vācāpeti, vācāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:756_0: Tathā tudantaṁ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti, todāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:756_1: Pavisantaṁ payojayati, pavisituṁ vā paveseti, pavesayati, pavesāpeti, pavesāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:756_4: Sayantaṁ payojayati sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyāpeti, sāyāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:756_5: Ettha ekārassa āyādeso, sayāpeti, sayāpayati, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇāpeṇāpayesu āyādesassa rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:756_7: Patiṭṭhantaṁ payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti, patiṭṭhāpayati, patiṭṭhapeti vā.
anya-e0805n5:760_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:760_1: Ghāteti, ghātayati, ghātāpeti, ghātāpayati, “vadho vā sabbatthā”ti vadhādese vadheti, vadhāpeti.
anya-e0805n5:761_1: Jahantaṁ payojayati jahāpeti, jahāpayati, hāpeti, hāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:761_3: Pidahantaṁ payojayati pidhāpeti, pidhāpayati, pidahāpeti, pidahāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762_0: Rundhantaṁ payojayati rodheti, rodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762_1: Chindantaṁ payojayati chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762_2: Yuñjantaṁ payojayati yojeti, yojayati, yojāpeti, yojāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762_3: Bhuñjantaṁ payojayati bhojeti, bhojayati, bhojāpeti, bhojāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:762_4: Muñcantaṁ payojayati moceti, mocayati, mocāpeti, mocāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:763_4: Tussantaṁ payojayati toseti, tosayati, tosāpeti, tosāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:763_5: Sammantaṁ payojayati sameti, samayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:763_7: Jāyantaṁ payojayati janeti, janayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:764_0: Suṇantaṁ payojayati dhammaṁ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṁ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:765_3: Gaṇhantaṁ payojayati gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpeti, gāhāpayati, gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:766_1: Yo koci karoti, tamañño “karohi karohi”iccevaṁ bravīti, karontaṁ payojayati, kātuṁ vā kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:767_1: Cintentaṁ payojayati cintāpeti, cintāpayati, pūjentaṁ payojayati pūjāpeti, pūjāpayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:770_1: Tikicchantaṁ payojayati tikiccheti, tikicchayati, tikicchāpeti, tikicchāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:770_2: Evaṁ bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, pabbatāyantaṁ payojayati pabbatāyayati.
anya-e0805n5:777_0: Taṁ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṁ rāgādidūsakanti.
